about_the_game:
You have one goal - help all the HopHops escape by navigating them to hot air balloons! Do this before the Foxes catch them, otherwise it's game over!



Play through many puzzle sets, create your own puzzles, and then share or play puzzles online!



Get ready to give your brain a workout with laid-back puzzles based around designing the flow of HopHops around the game board.

The rules are simple:
  • HopHops and Foxes will always move forward until they hit a wall.
  • If they hit a wall, they will turn right until they can continue walking forward.
  • You must place arrows to change their direction, directing the HopHops out of harm's way and towards their escape!

There are many different puzzle sets to try, each with its own theme and varying difficulties. You can also look forward to regular and free updates with fresh content.



Solving puzzles is fun - but when you're done solving, you may want to try your hand at creating!

HopHop Fox lets you hop into the driver's seat and begin creating your own puzzles. Use the puzzle creator to start building your own brain-teasers and share them with your friends and the world.



Waiting for the release of new puzzle sets or itching to see how others handle your puzzle creations?

With the Online mode, you can select 3 of your puzzles to represent you online and see how many other plays succeed or fail in solving them. You can also attempt to solve puzzles representing other players - good luck!
